attributes.action: recommend that the logo for the 2012 Olympics be changed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The newly announced logo for the London 2012 Olympic Games is, to be blunt, horrific. It stands for absolutely nothing, having managed to do away with the one bit of meaning most easily incorporated in an Olympic logo - the 5 rings for the 5 continents.

The former logo, with the ribbon in the shape of the Thames, the 5 coloured rings, and the simple text "LONDON 2012" was infinitely preferable, and its reinstatement would be a vast improvement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
